code: @Override public ActionRequestValidationException validate() {     // we cannot apply our validation rules here as an authenticate request could be for an LDAP user that doesn't fit our restrictions     return null. }
public void username(String username) {     this.username = username. }
@Override public String[] usernames() {     return new String[] { username }. }
@Override public void readFrom(StreamInput in) throws IOException {     super.readFrom(in).     username = in.readString(). }
@Override public void writeTo(StreamOutput out) throws IOException {     super.writeTo(out).     out.writeString(username). }
